QuestData.Title: Survivors of Heartwood Grove
QuestData.Description:
Korenth... I can't believe he's...
We have to save whomever we can. Droman Krelnor is too strong for us to face alone.
I saw a few other survivors scattered around the grove. Hurry, we have no time to waste!
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue Casad, Wagonmaster Derawyn, and Te'zan from the possessed.
QuestData.RewardText: Derawyn... I can't lose her too! We can use the animacones to save her!
